# ion-tab-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### mode



The mode determines which platform styles to use.
Possible values are: `"ios"` or `"md"`.
For more information, see [Platform Styles](/docs/theming/platform-specific-styles).


#### selected

boolean
